items.summary: Investigate and fix the issue causing all heart notes to disappear from the HeartCanvas after the Version 7 deployment. Ensure that previously stored heart notes are correctly fetched from the backend and rendered on the canvas.

Verify that the backend's heart note list and CRUD functions (add, get, list, edit, delete) are functioning correctly and returning data as expected. If the Version 7 deployment introduced any state loss or schema change, restore or migrate the data appropriately.
